basics.name: Sribooshan Srinivasan
basics.label: Digital IC Design Engineer
basics.summary: Passionate IC design engineer, engrossed in learning the field of integrated-circuit design (analog, digital and mixed-signal) and computer architecture.

work.name: MaxLinear Inc.
work.summary: Part of the SoC Design team in Chennai, working on products catering to the 5G market.

work.summary: Part of the pre-silicon validation team for Ixana's YR series chips.
highlights: VCS, Verdi, Synopsys Custom Compiler, Verilog HDL

education.institution: College of Engineering, Guindy, Anna University
courses: Digital VLSI Design, Computer Architecture and Organisation, CMOS Analog IC Design, Mixed-Signal IC Design, RF Microelectronics
